casebody.data:
GILBANE BUILDING CO./TDX CONSTRUCTION CORP., et al., Appellants,
v.
ST. PAUL FIRE AND MARINE INSURANCE COMPANY, et al., Defendants, Liberty Insurance Underwriters, Respondent. 2018-34 Court of Appeals of New York. January 11, 2018

**581*804Motion by Turner Construction Company for leave to file a brief amicus curiae on the appeal herein granted and the proposed brief is accepted as filed. The brief must be submitted in digital format within seven days.
